name: CDSHooksExtensionDaVinciConfigTest
title: CDS Hook Extension Definition for DaVinci Configuration  (Test)
description: This structure is defines the CRD Configuration  (Test only)

element.short: The context for the patient-view hook
element.definition: The context for the patient-view hook

element.short: Identifies the setting configuration when hook is invoked
element.definition: A code that will be used when setting configuration during hook invocation, and has an (extensible) binding to the CRD Card Types ValueSet.

element.short: The value of the config option
element.definition: The value of the config option
